Npc_HiddenKorokFly.description: On Dragonhead Island, there is a tree stump filled with water. Inside the stump is a circle made of flowers. Dive into it.
Underneath the staircase by the waterfall on Wellspring Island. Stand by the pinwheel and shoot the three descending balloons.
Stand on the tree stump and dive after the fairy lights.

The start is to the north, at 4612 2283 1299. You can activate the dragon ring on the lowest island and use the cannons to reach the island. Then, use the Paraglider to glide southward and land on the glowing target.
Climb on the Korok platform on the side of the floating island.
Shoot the acorn. It's dangling from a chain at the end of the mine cart track, over the edge of the cliff.
Start at 1300, -1977, 0628. Paraglide to the glowing platform.

Before this pillar there's another one that has a korok platform you need to reach this one in time.
The platform is at 2409 -1821 1570
Climb onto circle hanging from the side of the little island. The actual Elevation is 1255.
Land on target from the platform on the small island southeast (-1829, -1917, 1200) from here.
Climb on the platform on the northeast side of the little island. The actual Elevation is 974.
Look for the stump pad on the south side of the little island. The actual Elevation is 1859.
Stand on the tree pad at the edge of the island. Chase the fairy lights and interact with it mid-air to reveal the Korok.
Next to the island with the shrine, step onto the tree stump, jump down at the same time and activate the korok mid air
Stand on the platform and dive after the falling lights. Examine them in flight to reveal the Korok.
Examine while falling down

While standing at Pinwheel in the hollowed-out tree at 4824, -0819, 1939,
shoot the three balloons floating around the other big stump.
Jump from leaf platform, examine as it falls
Climb down from the northwest side of the little island, hanging there on the vertical platform.
Use Ascend on the east wall to get up to a platform on the smaller island (-3063, 2136, 0693). From here, paraglide to the marked spot.
Island with the platform is to the south, just slightly above this island (hidden under the bigger island above). Coordinates for the platform are -3960, 0649, 1505.
A platform (-3612, 1030, 1815 - on top of the hill on the island) with a glide challenge. Reach the target (-3641, 1046, 1793) without touching the ground before the light disappears

Once you find the shrine, head outside and stand on the cliff looking out. Look down and slightly to your left and you will notice a small island. Step on the stump and interact with the light in midair for your seed. 
Note: this is not above in the water, it's below. Don't jump or use Tulin. Walk off and press A when it says "examine." Happens quickly.
Break the acorn jar at the top of the spire.
Stand on the tree stump and dive after the fairy lights.
The small upper island has the jump off point for glide landing challenge. (Jump point located at -3373, 0012, 2324)
Stand on the tree pad at the edge of the labyrinth. Chase and interact with the fairy lights in mid-air to reveal the Korok.
Stand on the tree pad at the edge of the labyrinth. Chase and interact with the fairy lights in mid-air to reveal the Korok.
Step on the leaf pad. Dive after the falling fairy lights and catch them in mid-fall to reveal the Korok.
After completing To the Kingdom of Hyrule, teleport back to the Room of Awakening and return to the room you first woke up in.
Examine the fairy lights at the top of the tree trunk.
Shoot the balloon. To reach this spot, there's a nearby hole with breakable rock that you can drop down.
Recommended: Level 1 Cold Resistance
Stand on the broken pillar under the temple (elevation 1418), and look up. Use Ascend into the stump to collect the seed.
Dive into the lily pad circle.
Complete the rock circle around the tree using the nearby rock or one fused to your weapon. Unlocking the paraglider first is recommended.
Recommended: Level 1 Cold Resistance

Npc_HiddenKorokGround.description: Lift the rock on top of the tree.
Use the boat to get to the top of the arch and lift the rock for the korok.
Time trial. Starting location at (-3103, 3260, 865) to the north-west.
On the lower level (Elevation 1193), chase the fairy lights.
Pickup the stone in the tree stump under the leaves
Lift the rock on the top of the island.
Complete the stone circle. The rock is found inside a nearby stump.
Ascend to the utmost top of the forge island and lift the stone on top of the tree.
Follow the Flowertrail (starts at  2335, -1845, 1685 in the middle of the tower).
Complete the rock triangle using the nearby rock
Rock at the top of the tree
Chase the moving flower from the big hollow tree around center of the island to reveal the Korok.
Follow the flower trail.
Catch the fairy light.
Pick up the rock on the island in the lake.
Climb up the big tree and pick up the rock at the top.
Inside a tree trunk. Remove the leaves and then pick up the rock.
Recommended: Level 1 Cold Resistance
Recommended: Level 1 Cold Resistance

KorokCarry_Destination.description: Reunite the Korok with his friend.
Reunite Korok with his friend.

Npc_HiddenKorokFly.description: (Inside Hebra Great Skeleton.) Shoot the balloon in the right eye.
(Inside Hebra Great Skeleton.) Shoot the balloon in the left eye.
Stand on the tree stump atop the summit (-4422, 3215, 0391) and race to the circle of lights. Shield surfing is one way to get there quickly.
Complete the three dimensional hashtag shape using the nearby metal block piece.
Hit the dandelion and catch it before it touches the ground.
Climb the dead tree and examine the fairy lights.
Stand next to the pinwheel and shoot the balloons.
Attach the nearby boulder to the counterweight to dislodge the cork.
Examine the fairy lights at the top of the cliffs.
Follow the flower trail beginning at -4227, 1748, 0111 (under the bone).
Place a Spicy Pepper in each of the two remaining offering bowls.
Pop the balloon under bridge
Place the nearby boulder onto the wooden totem
Climb on the one tree that the arrows point to and activate the dancing lights.
Shoot the targets from the top of the skeleton.
Break the hanging jar from a rope.
Follow the flower trail from the highest point in the ruins at -4442, -2273, 0080
Float from the starting stump to the landing bullseye. The puzzle starts at (-4482,-2133, 0068)
Complete the square structure using the nearby piece
Ascend through the stump on the underside of the rib bone. Be prepared for sand pushing you away from the stump.
Climb to the highest point of the skeleton to hit, then catch, the dandelion
Follow the flower trail starting from the base of the dead tree nearby (west) (-3842, 3347, 0311).
Stand next to the pinwheel and shoot the balloons.
Directly to the east, at the same elevation, is a platform (-3993, 3836, 220). From there, paraglide across the updraft to the marked spot.
Ascend into the ceiling stump below the cliff.
Examine the fairy lights at the top of the dead tree.
Step on the tree stump to the southeast (-3428, 3799, 0245) and race to the ring before the time runs out.
Use the movable block segment to complete the crest shape.
There is a ceiling stump in the entrance of the Hebra Mountains Northwest Cave. Ascend into it.
Examine the fairy lights at the top of the tree.
Use the nearby metal block piece to complete the shape.
Stand on the leaf pad on the south peak (-3328, 2301, 0403), then race to the circle of lights that appears.
Examine the fairy lights on top of the cabin's chimney.
Follow the flower trail on top of the Flight Range cabin (-3796, 2322, 0170).
Shoot the jar hanging from the bridge.
Stand near the pinwheel atop the hill and shoot the balloon.
Step on the platform that's on the higher point to the east (-3820, 1319, 0287) and then paraglide to the marked spot.
In the tunnel below the cliff, you will find a ceiling stump. Ascend into it.
Ascend into the ceiling stump beneath the cliff.
Move the blocks into place to make the shape symmetrical.
Ascend into the marked stump.
Follow the flower trail beginning on the nearby pillar to the southwest (-3621, 1522, 0145).
Weigh down the cork by attaching stuff to it, then throw it over the edge.
Repair the roof of the shed using the nearby board.
Shoot the balloon under the bridge.
Follow the flower trail starting on a pillar to the north (-3649, 510, 286) on the other side of the nearby Flame Gleeok.
Shoot the balloon between the stone pillars.
Examine the fairy lights at the top of the tree.
Starting from the pillar to the south (-3966, 0625, 0189), paraglide to the marked spot.
Use ascend and go through the stump
Hit the dandelion and then catch it before it touches the ground.
Position the movable blocks to complete the plus shape.
Use the nearby blocks to finish the windmill structure.
Step on the seed platform (-3206, 0333, -0099) and race to the destination. Using Ascend will help get there quickly enough.
At the bottom of the mountain, there is a small cave with a ceiling stump. Use Ascend to reveal the Korok.
Use Ultrahand to lift the boulder from the nearby hole and place it in the three-pronged tree stump.
Complete the Korok race (Starting place found at -3620 -0403 0239)
Examine the fairy lights at the top of the tree
Complete the Korok race to the other side of the rock
Stand next to the Pinwheel and shoot the three balloons
Complete the Korok race (Starting position at -3845 -1465 0366), on a small ledge above the cliff.
Use ascend on the wooden stump underneath the bridge
Stand at the edge of the scaffolding next to the pinwheel and shoot the balloons.
Break the acorn in the center teardrop geoglyph.
Cut, and then catch the flower puff before it hits the ground.
Break the acorn hanging below the cliff overhang
Attach a nearby metal crate to pull the cork out
Complete the metal block puzzle
Finish the block puzzle
Attach the metal plates to pull the cork out
Place a nearby boulder onto the wooden totem
Examine the lights above the chimney of the bar.
The beginning is on the other tower at -3857, -3018, 0085. Race to the ring before the time runs out.
Climb to the top of the lighthouse tower and examine the fairy lights.
Ascend through the stump in the ruins. (NOT inside of the ruin caverns)
Pick up dandelion mid air after hitting.
Climb to the top of the tower, then glide to land on the target
Stand next to the pinwheel and shoot the balloons.
Use the nearby lumber to create a roof for the two statues.
Shoot the jar hanging beneath the bridge.
Stand next to the pinwheel and shoot the balloons.
Stand on the leaf platform atop the nearby summit (-2001, 3147, 0385). Glide down to the marked spot.
Use the metal block piece to complete the hourglass shape.
Follow the water underneath to reach a block puzzle. Move the metal piece into the position which makes the shape symmetric.
Grab the boulder from the nearby hole and place it into the three-pronged stump.
The fairy lights are floating in midair. One of the nearby boulders should get you close enough to reach.
Shoot the jar in the nearby stump.
Complete the metal block puzzle at the base of the canyon.
Climb the dead tree and examine the fairy lights at the top.
Complete the mushroom shape using the block on a nearby ledge.
Shoot the jar on the side of the mountain.
Examine the fairy lights on the cabin chimney.
Starting from the platform to the southeast (-2580, 1249, 0216) complete the race in time.
Dive into the circle of lily pads.
Follow the flower trail that begins on top of the mushroom-shaped structure east of the stable (-2897, 0557, 0208).
Examine the fairy lights at the top of the platform.
Race from the platform on top of the other pillar (-2918, 0286, 0207).
There is an arch below with a ceiling stump. Use Ascend to reveal the Korok.
Glide from the starting point to the landing bulleseye stump. The starting point is on the jutting rock cliff to the northeast: -2838 -0437 0052
Stand atop the stump at (-2479, -0509, 0222) and glide towards the seed pad that appears to reveal the Korok.
Grab the boulder from the hole at the bottom of the hill and use Ultrahand to place it on the three-pronged stump.
The start of the race to the seed is at (-2696, -1446, 0543), to the east. Using a shield to surf down is recommended.
Shoot the acorn under the bridge to reveal the korok seed!
There is a ceiling stump located below the hill - use Ascend to reveal the Korok.

Ascend through the korok platform on the bottom side of the arch.
Attach the rock to the cork, then toss the chained rock over the edge of the hill to pop open the log.
Red arrow points to rock in a corner. Examine the fairy lights.

This Korok is obtained by touching a nearby Korok platform (-2251, -2359, 0275) on a ledge that starts a race to the wooden scaffolding above it.
(Climber’s Armor Set helps)
Climb to the seed platform on top of the sword right next to the sinkhole (-2731 -2820 0035), then race to the ring.
Shoot the acorn hanging from below!
Place the boulder in the twig brace to reveal the korok seed!
Catch the dandelion before it hits the ground
Ascend into the ceiling stump found in an indentation near the base of the cliff (-0995, 3083, 0200).
Complete the rock pattern using the nearby rock or one fused to a weapon.

Starting from the platform on the west side of the river (-1034, 1083, 0062), paraglide to the marked spot.
There is a wooden stump on the ceiling of cave entrance. Use the Ascend ability into it.
The fairy lights are floating in midair. To reach them, use the three wooden planks nearby to create a platform and glide to it.
Shoot the jar hanging underneath the cliff.
Shoot the jar hanging from the bridge.
One cork is stuck in the stump. Weigh the other down by attaching various things to it and then throw it off the cliff.
Place the boulder that's slightly downhill and in a little gully on the wooden frame.
Shoot the jar under the bridge.
Examine the fairy lights on top of the stone.
Begins on the top of the Ancient Tree Stump (-1109, -0420, 0062). Paraglide onto marked spot.
Interact with fairy lights atop the fountain.
Dive from the bridge into the circle of lilies.
Move the movable section so that it creates a staircase shape that's mirrored to the already completed example.
Hit the dandelion and then catch it before it touches the ground.
Catch the dandelion before it hits the ground to reveal the Korok.

Shoot the acorn hanging beneath the bridge.
Put the cork in the water as deep as you can, when it bounces out youll get the korok
Cut down two trees, use Ultrahand to glue their stumps together, and use them as a bridge to reach the fairy lights in the water.
Follow the arrow signs and examine the fairy lights
Shoot the balloons from the pinwheel at the top of the labyrinth.
Use Ascend through the leaf sign platform from below.
Attach a boulder to the target, then throw the boulder and target off the side of the cliff to reveal the korok seed!
Stand next to the pinwheel and shoot the balloon.

Dive into the center of the lily circle.

Find a pinwheel on the eagle statue and shoot arrows at the 3 moving balloons.

Follow the flower trail, starting at the bottom of the watchtower(-0467,0852,0100) southwest from mark
Stand near the pinwheel and break the balloons.
Drop down off the walkway to see the puzzle. There is a gap you can fall down just past the arched entryway.
Dive into the ring of flowers located at the entrance to the moat (This is on ground level, not the floating castle)

Land on the target from the stump at -0305, 1123, 0089. This is on ground level, not the floating castle. If you follow the path into the moat from the flower ring korok and ascend as soon as you can, you end up almost next to the stump just look around and you'll see it on a ledge.
Located at the top of the tower. Climb spire and examine the fairy light.
Shoot the jar in the tree.
Shoot the balloon under the bridge.
Reach the goal before time runs out. Begins at the top of a hill to the south, next to a tree (-0949, 0680, 0055).
Dive into the circle of flowers.
Follow the flower trail. (Starts at the top of the large hill to the west: -0525, 0186, 0062.)
Create a plus shape using the U-shaped block.
Look up inside the ruins for the tree circle and use Ascend into it.
Ascend into the marked spot.

Shoot the balloon at the top of the tree.
biggest tree, Shoot the jar
Catch the dandelion!
At -656 -1389 0053 get on top of the korok stump and then paraglide into the circle on a determined amount of time.
Interact with the fairy lights at the top of the central spire.
Stand near the pinwheel at the top of the stump and shoot the balloons.

Stand next to the pinwheel at the top of the tower. Shoot the balloons.
Enter the small cave, then use ascend on the korok-looking circle. Once ascended, press A to exit and you will get the Korok!
Shoot the acorn hanging from the tree.
Jump from the platform just to the south (-0682, -1842, 0095) and land on the target without landing anywhere else first.

Build a platform to raise link high enough to interact with the fairy lights. Hover Stones can help a lot here.
Break the acorn jar hanging from the pillar underneath the bridge.

Find the arrow on the beach and follow it to find an arrow on a rock in the water. Follow this arrow to the rock it is pointing at. Sparkling lights will appear; click to reveal the Korok.

Dive into the flowers to reveal the korok. Link can bypass nearby pirate ships and its bokoblin camp.

This Korok is found by popping a cork out of a stump. This can be done by using Ultrahand to submerge the other cork to which it is chained. When released, it will shoot out of the water and yank the first cork free.
Examine the fairy lights on top of a rock near a small pond.
Shoot acorn jar that's hanging on one of the branches.

Stand on the leaf pad above this seed at (3153, 3430, 0137). Glide and land on the seed pad to reveal the korok.
Stand on the Leaf Pad at (3575, 3046, 0110). Glide down to the Seed Pad to reveal the Sussy Korok.
Use Ultrahand to lift the boulder from the nearby hole and place it onto the three-pronged stump.
Chase and interact with the fairy lights.
Interact with the fairy lights at the top of the tree.
Examine the fairy lights at the top of the broken arch. Note a Gloom Hands is nearby.
Complete the Metal Block Puzzle.
Interact with the fairy lights at the top of the broken pillar.
Use Ultrahand to ring the bell in the Tarrey Town fountain.

Fuse a rocket to the counterweight using Ultrahand and use it to pop the cork underneath the bridge. Alternatively use Ultrahand to push one end of the cork under water and let it pop back up and pop the cork.
Attach the boulder to the counterweight and drop it over the edge of the broken platform to pop the cork.
Start on the rock at the bottom of the waterfall. Zora Armor recommended.
Shoot the balloon under the staircase.
Stand at the pinwheel and shoot the balloons. There are two straight ahead and one to the right. They are very far away.
Dive into the circle of lilies.
Complete the block puzzle
Underneath the big piece of sky island debris, follow the flower trail. The flower trail begins at 3664, 0449, 0246.
Stand near the Korok fan on the ledge and shoot all balloons.
Step on the leaf pad on top of the southeast mountain (3069, 0176, 0262). Race to the circle of lights to reveal the Korok.
Examine the fairy lights at the top of the statue. Either climb or paraglide to the top from Toto Lake.
Examine the fairy lights at the top of the pine tree.

Step on the leaf platform and hop on to target. Paraglider is recommended. The leaf platform is located at 3292, -0010, 0297. (This player notes they had to use Recall to remove a fallen rock on the leaf platform.)
Stand next to the pinwheel. Shoot the balloons.
Jump from the pier into the lilly pad circle.
Climb to the top of the tree and examine the fairy lights
Climb to the top of the tree and examine the fairy lights
Climb to the top of the tree and examine the fairy lights
Climb to the top of the bare tree and examine the fairy lights.
Use Ultrahand to swing the bell to make the bell ring.
Hit the dandelion, then catch the fallen seed.
Climb to the top of the flagpole and examine the fairy lights.
Finish the rock pattern, one rock on the pattern and one rock near it.

The starting tree stump is on the stone hill a little further east at 3018 -2033 0050
Hover and land on the arrival tree stump
Dive into the circle of flowers.
Pinwheel to the top and shoot the balloons

Stand at the pinwheel on a rock and shoot the balloon.

Examine the shiny on top of the palm tree

In front of the ruin entrance. Climb the pillar that the 3 red arrows point to and interact with the fairy lights.

Stand next to the pinwheel and shoot the balloons.
Examine the fairy lights at the top of the crane.
Follow the flower trail.

Complete the metal block puzzle.
Stand on the pile of debris and interact with the fairy lights.
There are signs in the area that point out a tree. Climb that tree all the way to the top and examine the fairy lights.
Interact with the fairy lights at the top of the tree.

Time trial starting at 4476, 0937, 0097.
(To the west of the icon, along the same cliff as the shrine but behind it)
Halfway down the side of the cliff, there is an alcove with a Ceiling Stump. Use Ascend to reveal the Korok.
Attach the nearby boulder to the counterweight to pop the cork.
Use the nearby wooden planks to create a bridge that you can use to reach the fairy lights.
Stand on the nearby leaf pad at (4697, 0546, 0230) and glide over to the seed pad to reveal the Korok.
Stand next to the pinwheel and shoot the balloons.
Solve the Metal Block Puzzle.
Use ultrahand to grab the huge rock just across and put it on the wooden rack.
Located underneath the pass. Ascend through the stump.
Start at the leaf platform that is located on the rocks (4184, -0444, 0024). Use the airstream to help you get there in time.
Stand on top of rock at the junction of 3 red arrows, Examine lights on top of a rock.
Hit the dandelion and catch it before it hits the ground.
Dive into the ring.
To complete this seed, attach the nearby log to the plug, the drop off the side of the cliff
Place the Large rock down the hill on the tri-tipped pedestal.
Climb the curvy palm tree and examine the fairy lights at the top.
Examine the Fairy Lights on top of the smallest rock. It will be at the center of three red arrows.
Submerge the cork as deep as you can with Ultrahand, then let go. The cork will pop out of the barrel.
Catch the dandelion before it touches the ground.
Use ultrahand to submerge the cork as deep as you can, then let go.

Examine the fairy lights located at the top of the belltower.

Ring the bell in the bell tower with Ultrahand.

KorokCarry_Destination.description: Reunite the korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with his friend found to the south. Watch out for the Lynel and Blizzrobe along the path.
Take the Korok to his friend. There's quicksand all around him initially. Behind him a little further, there is material to make a propeller slider.
Take the Korok to his friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with his friend. The lost Korok is directly East of the marker, and just North of Lake Illumeni You can build a car with nearby materials.
Reunite the Korok with his friend using the nearby Zonai devices.
Reunite the korok with their friend.
Use Ultrahand to transport the Korok to his friend. Starting point is -2980, -2333, 0025.

Take the Korok to his friend. Watch out for sand mist and don't fall into the quicksand towards the destination. You can craft a Propeller Slider with nearby materials. Starting point -3345,-3057,0041
Take the Korok to his friend, using Ultrahand.
Reunite the korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with his friend

Take the Korok to his friend using Ultrahand. You can craft a Propeller Slider with nearby materials to make the journey easier. Watch out for the Molduga which revolves around the starting point, and avoid the quicksand hole cluster.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with his friend - it is possible to walk the Korok to his friend with Ultrahand, crossing the Gleeok Bridge (but be wary of the Battle Talus).

Reunite the Korok with his friend. It is possible to incrementally move the Korok up the mountainside using Ultrahand, but there are also platforms nearby that can be combined with a balloon and flame emitter if necessary.
Attach a balloon (with a flame emitter) to one of the nearby steel platforms to carry the Korok up to his friend.
Reunite the Korok with his friend. Use a stake and a plank to get the Korok up the cliff.
Reunite the Korok with his friend.
Reunite the Korok with his friend. Craft a glider with nearby materials. Starting location -1017,-2631,0200
Starts at -1128, -1971, 0144. Attach a fan to one of the nearby wooden planks and use it to deliver the Korok to his friend across the river.
Help the Korok reach their friend.
Reunite the korok with their friend.
Reunite the korok with their friend.

Deliver the Korok to their friend. The lost Korok can be found near Susuyai Shrine. There are nearby materials available to make a car and drive them to their companion. Alternatively, you could carry the Korok the entire way using Ultrahand.
Deliver the Korok to his friend. You can walk the entire distance carrying him with Ultrahand.
Use a balloon (and any source of flame of your choosing) on one of the nearby wooden planks to lift the Korok up to his friend on the Great Plateau.
Return the Korok to his friend. This one can just be walked back to his friend using Ultrahand. Starts at -0695, 1573, 0066
Reunite the Korok with his friend
Reunite the Korok with his friend. You can craft a 4x4 with nearby materials. Starting location is around -0320, -3309, 0025.
Reunite the korok with their friend.
Reunite the korok with their friend.
Reunite the korok with their friend.
Reunite Korok with his friend by attaching Korok to the nearby Wing and Rocket to send them across the river.
Use Ultrahand to walk the Korok to his friend.
Reunite Korok with his friend. You can cut down the nearby trees and use them to make a bridge across the river.
Reunite the Korok with his friend. You can carry the korok with Ultrahand and walk to the destination.

Reunite the Korok with his friend. You can take Proxim Bridge for a shorter path but with a river obstacle or take a longer path via Owlan Bridge located further north but which goes to the destination region without obstacle.
Reunite the Korok with their friend across the canyon. The friend is across Deya Lake at 0522, -2195, 0055. All the parts you need to construct a glider are beside the friend.
Reunite the Korok with his friend. You can build a vehicle with nearby materials, but there are only 2 wheels.
Reunite the Korok with his friend
Get the korok on the ground to the korok on the cliff.
This Korok starts on the west side of the beach. Get the Korok to their friend, then talk to either Korok to receive 2 Korok Seeds.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Build a raft using the nearby materials and use it to get the Korok across the river to his friend.
Reunite the Korok with his friend. It is possible to walk this Korok all the way to his friend using Ultrahand.
Reunite the Korok with his friend. It is possible to walk this Korok all the way across the shallow water using Ultrahand.
Use the nearby materials to build a bridge, then take the Korok across the river and reunite him with his friend.
Use the nearby Hyrule Restoration Materials to create a vehicle to take this Korok all the way to his friend.
Reunite the Korok with his friend
Reunite the Korok with his friend. You can build a propeller raft with nearby materials.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.
Reunite the Korok with their friend.

Deliver the Korok to his friend. It is possible to walk this Korok all the way to his friend using Ultrahand.  Also can take out a horse with towing harness attached and attach it to the nearby carriage (Foothill Stable).  Attack korok to carriage and ride horse along path up the hill to reach korok's friend.
Attach the nearby fan to the nearby wing and use it to deliver the Korok to his friend.starts at 2809, 0183, 0146.
Use Ultrahand and Recall to deliver the Korok up the side of the mountain to his friend.
Use Ultrahand and Recall to maneuver the Korok up the side of the mountain to his friend.
Use Ultrahand (and Recall, if necessary) to deliver the Korok to his friend.

Reunite the Korok with his friend. It is possible to walk this Korok all the way to his friend using Ultrahand. Starting location 
(1873, -0803, 0239)
Using the nearby materials, build a long bridge across the river, then use Ultrahand to carry the Korok to his friend.
Use Ultrahand to drop the Korok down the cliffside and deliver him to his friend.
Reunite the Korok with his friend. You can use the material nearby to make a vehicle and take the korok.
Reunite the Korok with his friend. You can simply carry the korok with Ultrahand.
Reunite the Korok with his friend by building a vehicle with the wheels and rudder nearby
Attach the nearby Fan to the nearby Wing and use it to fly the Korok to his friend. Is starting from the other side
Reunite the Korok with his friend. It is possible to walk this Korok all the way to his friend using Ultrahand. There are also Zonai parts nearby to build a cart to transport him.
Attach the nearby sled to the nearby fan and steering stick using Ultrahand, then use the vehicle to deliver the Korok to his friend.
Reunite the Korok with his friend. It is possible to walk this Korok to his friend using Ultrahand. You can also watch him roll 75% of the way down the hill to save some time.
Transport the Korok to their friend. Just grab the Korok and walk over there.
Use the nearby boards, steering stick and fan to create a raft. Use it to deliver the Korok to his friend.
Use Ultrahand to shuttle the Korok along the shore to his friend. The start is at 3654, -0605, 0003.
Reunite the Korok with their friend. The Korok is on top of a cliff at 3998 -0186 0176, by Apogek Shrine.
Combine the nearby stone slabs, wheels and Steering Stick into a vehicle and drive the Korok up the mountain to his friend. Balloon and Fan is recommed.
Use Ultrahand to deliver this Korok down the cliffside to his friend.
Use Ultrahand to carry this Korok up the mountainside to his friend.
Reunite the korok with his friend using a vehicle built with nearby materials
Reunite the Korok with his friend on the other side of the sea. You can walk around with Ultrahand or make a raft with a plank, turbine and rudder which are a little further west.
The lost korok can be found to the West of the map marker. Just across the body of water.
Deliver the Korok to his friend. It is possible to carry the Korok all the way to his friend using Ultrahand.
Deliver the Korok to his friend. It is possible to carry the Korok directly to his friend using Ultrahand.
Attach the Korok to the nearby Wing and send him down to his friend.
Deliver the Korok to his friend. Use Ultrahand to carry the Korok along the way, using Recall to elevate him to a higher cliff to cross over to his friend's side.starts at 4052, 0944,0276
Drop the Korok off the side of Cape Cales cliff. Use a wing to glide down to the island to reunite the Korok with his friend.
